seo.title: Japanese Calendar Tool - Era, Zodiac & Nine Star Calculator
seo.description: Calculate Japanese era (和暦), Chinese zodiac (十干十二支), constellation, and Nine Star Ki (九星) from a date. Free online tool with both English and Japanese support.
seo.keywords: Japanese era, wareki, Chinese zodiac, eto, nine star ki, kyusei, zodiac sign, birthday calculator
